person_course.name: course_id
person_course.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

person_course.name: user_id
person_course.description: user ID number

person_course.name: username
person_course.description: username

person_course.name: registered
person_course.description: Boolean flag, indicating that the user registered in the course (obsolete: should always be 1 or true)

person_course.name: viewed
person_course.description: Boolean flag, indicating that the user visited the course at least once

person_course.name: explored
person_course.description: Boolean flag, indicating that the user viewed at least half of the chapters of the course

person_course.name: certified
person_course.description: Boolean flag, indicating that the user earned a certificate in the course

person_course.name: ip
person_course.description: Modal value of the IP address from which this user connected, from tracking logs

person_course.name: cc_by_ip
person_course.description: Two-letter country code corresponding to the modal IP address

person_course.name: countryLabel
person_course.description: Full name of country corresponding to modal IP address

person_course.name: city
person_course.description: Full name of city corresponding to modal IP address

person_course.name: latitude
person_course.description: Latitude of city corresponding to modal IP address

person_course.name: longitude
person_course.description: Longitude of city corresponding to modal IP address

person_course.name: LoE
person_course.description: Level of education

person_course.name: YoB
person_course.description: Year of birth

person_course.name: gender
person_course.description: gender, one of 'm', 'f', or 'o' (or NULL)

person_course.name: grade
person_course.description: Final grade earned in the course, out of 100 points

person_course.name: start_time
person_course.description: Date of enrollment in the course

person_course.name: last_event
person_course.description: Date of last event of user, from tracking logs

person_course.name: nevents
person_course.description: Number of tracking log events

person_course.name: ndays_act
person_course.description: Number of days with activity, from tracking logs

person_course.name: nplay_video
person_course.description: Number of video play events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nchapters
person_course.description: Number of chapters visited by the user

person_course.name: nforum_posts
person_course.description: Number of forum posts and comments made by user

person_course.name: nforum_votes
person_course.description: Number of votes received by user's forum posts

person_course.name: nforum_endorsed
person_course.description: Number of endorsed forum posts by user

person_course.name: nforum_threads
person_course.description: Number of forum post threads by user

person_course.name: nforum_comments
person_course.description: Number of forum post comments by user

person_course.name: nforum_pinned
person_course.description: Number of forum posts by user which were pinned (good indicator of staff)

person_course.name: roles
person_course.description: Roles played by the user in the course, e.g. instructor, course_staff

person_course.name: nprogcheck
person_course.description: Number of progress check events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nproblem_check
person_course.description: Number of problem check events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nforum_events
person_course.description: Number of all kinds of forum events, from tracking logs

person_course.name: mode
person_course.description: Mode of registrant, e.g. honor, audit, verified

person_course.name: is_active
person_course.description: 1 if enrollment active on date of this data, else 0

person_course.name: cert_created_date
person_course.description: date when certificate was generated (if applicable)

person_course.name: cert_modified_date
person_course.description: date when certificate was modified (if applicable)

person_course.name: profile_country
person_course.description: two-letter country code as specified by user in their profile (only available after ~mid-2014)

person_course.name: email_domain
person_course.description: domain of the email address of the user, i.e. what appears after the '@'

person_course.name: ntranscript
person_course.description: Number of video transcript events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nshow_answer
person_course.description: Number of show answer events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nvideo
person_course.description: Number of video events (of all kinds) from tracking logs

person_course.name: nseq_goto
person_course.description: Number of 'sequence goto' navigational events from tracking logs

person_course.name: nseek_video
person_course.description: Number of 'video seek' events from tracking logs

person_course.name: npause_video
person_course.description: Number of 'video pause' events from tracking logs

person_course.name: avg_dt
person_course.description: Average time difference in seconds between consecutive events from tracking logs

person_course.name: sdv_dt
person_course.description: Standard deviation of difference in seconds between consecutive events from tracking logs

person_course.name: max_dt
person_course.description: Maximum difference in seconds between consecutive events from tracking logs

person_course.name: n_dt
person_course.description: Number of consecutive events used in time difference computations, from tracking logs

person_course.name: sum_dt
person_course.description: Total elapsed time (in seconds) spent by user on this course, based on time difference of consecutive events, with 5 min max cutoff, from tracking logs
